mapper.sql: select l.lesson_no, l.tch_no, l.std_no, l.sub_no, l.lesson_desc, l.lesson_fee, l.lesson_stat, l.std_lesson_stop, l.tch_lesson_stop, l.sdt, l.edt, l.tch_review, l.std_review, l.tch_eval, l.payment, l.pay_day, l.cal_date, l.cal_stat, l.std_stop_reason, l.tch_stop_reason, l.ref_stat, l.ref_date, l.ref_amount
mapper.select: , s.sch_type_no, l.lesson_no, m.name, m.mem_type_no, m.profile_photo, s.sub_name, l.sdt, l.edt from lesson l inner join subject s on l.sub_no = s.sub_no inner join member m on l.tch_no = m.mem_no where std_no = #{no}

, s.sch_type_no, l.lesson_no, m.name, m.mem_type_no, m.profile_photo, s.sub_name, l.sdt, l.edt from lesson l left outer join subject s on l.sub_no = s.sub_no left outer join member m on l.std_no = m.mem_no where tch_no = #{no}

select c.curr_lesson_dt, c.curr_lesson_st, c.curr_lesson_et, l.sdt, l.edt, cl.curr_lesson_no, cl.lesson_no, cl.lesson_conts, cl.lesson_days from lesson l inner join curriculum c on l.lesson_no = c.lesson_no inner join curr_lesson_conts cl on c.lesson_no = cl.lesson_no where l.lesson_no = #{haha}

, ,
from lesson l inner join curriculum c on l.lesson_no = c.lesson_no inner join curr_lesson_conts cl on c.lesson_no = cl.lesson_no where l.lesson_no = #{haha}
mapper.insert: insert into curr_lesson_conts(lesson_no, lesson_conts, lesson_days) values(#{lessonNo}, #{clc.lessonContents}, #{clc.lessonDays});
insert into lesson (tch_no, sub_no, lesson_desc, lesson_fee, sdt, edt) values (#{teacherNo}, #{subjectNo}, #{lessonDescription}, #{lessonFee}, #{startDate}, #{startDate});

insert into curriculum (lesson_no, curr_lesson_dt, curr_lesson_st, curr_lesson_et) values (#{lessonNo}, #{curriculum.curriculumLessonDay}, #{curriculum.curriculumLessonStartTime}, #{curriculum.curriculumLessonEndTime});
mapper.select: SELECT s.sub_no FROM subject s INNER JOIN school_type st ON s.sch_type_no = st.sch_type_no WHERE st.sch_type_no = #{schoolTypeNo} AND s.sub_name = #{subjectName};
